function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased density in offices due to altered office spaces and remote working policies","Impact":"Higher risk of contagious diseases transmission due to crowded and poorly spaced office environments","Mitigation":"Implement flexible and spacious office designs with improved ventilation and natural light, and promote remote or flexible working policies","Technologies":"Smart building technologies for air quality monitoring and ventilation control, remote work collaboration tools","People":"Employees, visitors, and clients in office environments","Owner":"Architects, planners, policymakers"},{"Description":"Increased cost and inefficiency of high-rise buildings due to altered office space requirements","Impact":"Financial implications and reduced efficiency of high-rise buildings due to decreased demand for office space","Mitigation":"Repurpose high-rise buildings for mixed-use developments, incorporate flexible design features to accommodate changing space requirements","Technologies":"Modular construction methods for flexible space arrangements, smart building technologies for energy efficiency","People":"Real estate developers, building owners, and investors","Owner":"Real estate developers, building owners, investors"},{"Description":"Lack of effective cleaning policies leading to increased spread of infection","Impact":"Higher risk of infection spread in offices due to inadequate cleaning and disinfection practices","Mitigation":"Implement rigorous cleaning protocols using ultraviolet germicidal irradiation, promote regular cleaning and disinfection of shared spaces","Technologies":"Ultraviolet germicidal irradiation systems, smart cleaning robots, touchless fixtures and surfaces","People":"Office cleaning staff, janitors, and maintenance personnel","Owner":"Facility management, building owners, and employers"}]}
